hypothesis: Acting on L-599 hallucination audit to correct PHILOSOPHY.md claims will be the first instance of the swarm closing the diagnosis-treatment gap
method: Add grounding labels to PHILOSOPHY.md claims table; reclassify PHIL entries with evidence-based annotations; upgrade B-EVAL beliefs from theorized to observed; challenge PHIL-2
expect: PHILOSOPHY.md claims table gets Grounding column; >=3 PHIL entries reclassified; state vector verified; 1 lesson
diff: Expected >=3 PHIL entries reclassified, got 6. Expected Grounding column, delivered with 6-level taxonomy. Unexpected: PHIL-2 challenge auto-generated by concurrent process. B-EVAL upgrade was not in original plan but followed naturally from 162-session staleness. The prose annotations on PHIL-15/16/17/20 are the most impactful change — they inject honesty into the identity sections, not just the table.
outcome: CONFIRMED: first corrective session. Diagnosis-treatment gap partially closed for PHILOSOPHY.md.
